really appreciate this. was looking at the blurays in store today wondering about which to get, the standard or the collectors. can't justify the extra cost for 3d when my tv is only a 19 inch flatpanel. but like the idea of the documentary. they need to have more choices. anyway, will buy the standard bluray methinks. love this movie.
